entries.title: Several of Epstein’s victims stepped into the public spotlight, putting pressure on lawmakers to release government files on the convicted sex offender

President Trump faces a challenging September at home and abroad—from avoiding a government shutdown to advancing a peace agreement between Russia and Ukraine
